title: Business Feature: A dispatcher can receive order from CPQ and assign it to an implementation manager
description:
Description
The Business Feature: A dispatcher can receive orders from CPQ and assign them to an implementation manager consisting of the Epics/Enablers:
Enabler: Implement corresponding catalogue item for creating organisation https://jira.devops.telekom.de/browse/SNOWTC-7529 
Enabler: Implement corresponding catalogue item for creating operation orders https://jira.devops.telekom.de/browse/SNOWTC-10694 
Enabler: Receive SD-LAN/WiFi sales order from CPQ https://jira.devops.telekom.de/browse/SNOWTC-7531 
    DOR:
acceptance_criteria: All epics related to this business feature are implemented
All epics related to this business feature are tested
